note:
Raindrops and Roses and Whiskers and Kittens is an account of a few favourite things from Coltrane to Julie Andrews and everything in between.

Boosting (a lot!) and posting pretty interesting, pretty and interesting things.

Here for fun. No personal questions. Creepy vibes, anti-trans blocked.
